show.subtitle: Specific information about using evidenced based natural health choices, with knowledgeable authors, guests and hosts.
show.title: The Natural Nurse

title: The Natural Nurse
content:
Host Dr. Eugene Zampieron, ND, AHG, www.drznaturally.com,  interviews Wise Woman Herbalist,  SUSUN S. WEED, the voice of the Wise Woman Tradition, and one of the “founding grandmothers of the herbal renaissance.
” Susan continues her discussion about her new book, on sexual health,  Down There: Sexual and Reproductive Health, the Wise Woman Way, with a focus on sexual wellness for men.
 Her four previous bestseller titles include New Menopausal Years the Wise Woman Way; Breast Cancer?
Breast Health!
The Wise Woman Way; Healing Wise, the Second Wise Woman Herbal; and Wise Woman Herbal for the Childbearing Year.
Weed maintains an active, worldwide teaching schedule.
She offers correspondence courses, online education through the Wise Woman University, and shamanic apprenticeships.
Contact:  www.susunweed.com
